description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' for unit testing, which implements the interface 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell'. It uses Google Mock to mock various methods of the interface, enabling controlled behavior in tests.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell interface for testing purposes.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns the locator string of the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name of the service.

methods.name: WebPrefix
methods.description: Returns the web prefix URL or path.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service is resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature is supported based on a uint8_t parameter.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables web server with given parameters.

methods.name: SubSystems
methods.description: Returns a pointer to the subsystem interface.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with given strings.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Returns whether the service runs in background.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the reason for last state change.

methods.name: StartMode
methods.description: Returns the start mode of the service.

methods.name: StartMode (overloaded)
methods.description: Sets the start mode of the service.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Handles hibernation with a given reason.
